hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: MODULES_LIST
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: comma separated with no spaces e.g. presto-main,presto-tests required only if RUN_TESTS=true, leave blank if testing build only

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: RUN_TESTS
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: if you only want to run a build without tests, set to false

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
source /home/openlookeng/.bashrc whoami ulimit -a mvn --version java -version
clone_code() { local url=$1 local repo=$2 local branch=$3 local msg=""
test -n "$branch" && branch="-b $branch"
for i in {1..3}; do msg=$(GIT_SSH_COMMAND="ssh -vvv" git clone $branch $url) test $? -eq 0 && return 0
sleep $((RANDOM%15+5)) rm -fr $repo done
echo $msg return 1 }
#git clone https://i-am-a-robot:Huawei%23999@gitee.com/openlookeng/hetu-core.git #git clone -b ${PULL_BASE_REF} git@gitee.com:openlookeng/hetu-core.git #git clone -b ${PULL_BASE_REF} https://gitee.com/openlookeng/hetu-core.git clone_code git@gitee.com:openlookeng/hetu-core.git hetu-core ${PULL_BASE_REF} cd hetu-core git fetch origin pull/${PULL_NUMBER}/head:${PULL_BASE_REF}-${PULL_NUMBER} #git checkout master-${PULL_ID} #git checkout master git config --global user.email "ci@abc.com" git config --global user.name "ci" git merge ${PULL_BASE_REF}-${PULL_NUMBER}
cd - #git clone https://i-am-a-robot:Huawei%23999@gitee.com/openlookeng/hetu-maven-plugin.git #git clone git@gitee.com:openlookeng/hetu-maven-plugin.git #git clone https://gitee.com/openlookeng/hetu-maven-plugin.git clone_code git@gitee.com:openlookeng/hetu-maven-plugin.git hetu-maven-plugin cd hetu-maven-plugin mvn clean install -DskipTests -T 2C cd -

source /home/openlookeng/.bashrc
whoami ulimit -a mvn --version java -version
rm -rf /tmp/* /tmp/*.* || true docker volume rm $(docker volume ls -q) || true
# remove all containers docker ps -aq | tr '\n' ' ' | xargs -rI % sh -c 'docker rm -f %;' sleep 15
cd ${WORKSPACE}/hetu-core
if [[ "${RUN_TESTS}" == 'true' ]] then mvn clean install -DskipTests -pl '!hetu-server, !hetu-server-rpm' -Dmaven.gitcommitid.skip=true
# modules list should not be empty [[ -n "${MODULES_LIST}" ]] # with the modules broken down into smaller sets, mvn test should not take longer than an hour # if it does, there is an issue timeout 3600 mvn test -pl "${MODULES_LIST}" -Dmaven.gitcommitid.skip=true
# a little hack so we don't archive the server and cli for test jobs rm -f hetu-server/target/hetu-server-*.tar.gz presto-cli/target/hetu-cli-*-executable.jar else mvn clean install -DskipTests -Dmaven.gitcommitid.skip=true fi
docker volume rm $(docker volume ls -q) || true
